resources.string:
Please start on your web server e.g.

 ./notify_store /srv/www/ugly.example.de/here/file.txt 58000 -d
 And on your linux desktop system e.g.

 ./notify_get ugly.example.de 80 /here/file.txt 300
Sorry, but \'%s\' needs really access to your notifications. You have to add these access in your phone preferences!
